item.description:
Maximum 12 people reserve your spot now!

Come enjoy beer and a slice of pizza at the Skytemple office while we present a multitude of WordPress related topics!

We're going to go with an idea of Jim Chevalier's and review what we covered in 2010. We'll also discuss our WordPress resolutions for what we want to learn in 2011. If there is time and interest left, we'll discuss the upcoming Valley Summit, a web conference run by the Skytemple team.

Suggested donation of 4-8 dollars to cover beer, pizza and overhead.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: WordPress@Skytemple
